Definetely not as good as Portal 2, Portal is still a good game. 

But the length is in question for me at the moment. I'm 2 hours in, and it seems as if I'm about to finish the game. 

In any case, not many puzzler games can keep people entertained throughout, but Portal always manages to do so.

Il gioco è ottimo: i personaggi e le meccaniche sono ben curate, uno dei migliori giochi per PC a cui abbia mai giocato, lo consiglio vivamente a tutti; almeno una volta nella vita bisogna provarlo :)
LOL I LOVE THIS GAME ITS SO fUN.....

A Portal egy igen csak rövid játék, de annál jobb. Nem csak szorakoztató, de gondolkodtató is. Tökéletes példa arra hogy egy FPS hogyan lehet más mint a többi FPS. A kinézete egyszerű letisztult, mégis remek atmoszférája van neki. A poénokat végig kapjuk az arcunkba ahogy haladunk előre. Ezeket a poónékat pedig a drága jó GLaDOS-unk szolgáltatja.  És ahogy az ember megtanul a portálokkal gondolkodni, hatalmas szorakozás lesz a játék. Öszintén mondom, a legjobb FPS-ek között van. 

Attól hogy maga a sztori rövid, még nem jelenti azt hogy a játékban nincs több kontent. Úgyanis ott van még a 6 tovább fejlesztett pálya is benne, illetve még a 6 kihívás pálya, amiken egyenként 3-3 kíhivás van. Kitudják a játékidőt rendesen tolni.

Egyértelműen 10/10 a játék. Ajánlom mindenkinek!

There's not a lot to be said about Portal. The game is a masterpiece. It sets the bar for 3d platforming puzzle games. The second one does a great job of picking up the torch but doesn't quite live up to this.
El juego es una excusa para implementar una muy buena idea. Si hubieran usado esa idea para meterla dentro de algo mas grande, hubiera sido genial.

put portals down, get owened by turrets, own turrets, get creeped out by ratman dens, die 10/10 best game

Portal is an iconic game on this day and age but I just started played it recently, although the overall game is simple I gotta admit it was addictive and fun, you can-t go wrong with this one, although I recommend to wait for a price drop because is really short.

PROS:
+Great game mechanics (Unique)
+Cool and funny history (the best thing)
+graphics do not disappoint at all for a game this old
+It will challenge your brain but without leaving you stuck mid-game

NEGATIVE:
- Too short, in 3 hrs you'll finish the main story
- The bonus challenges are tedious and only for hardcore gamers or achievement hunters
- Low - None re playability value 

Overall if you get the game on sale you won't regret at all, I strongly recommend to play this one before going for Portal 2

Totalmente recomendado, una historia totalmente atrapante, con muchos misterios y pocas explicaciones. La IA de GLaDOS que no entiende al ser humano añade un gran toque de humor, Valve tomate todo el tiempo para el Portal 3. 10/10
If you haven't played it you are missing out...great game.
This is the best singel player game ever made.

[h1]Özet:[/h1] Oyun her yönüyle çok güzel kesinlikle oynamalısınız.

[h1]Özetin de özeti:[/h1] [b]GLaDOS g*tümüzden kan alıyor.[/b]

Oyun bana eşsiz bir deneyim yaşattı diyebilirim daha başlarda GLaDOS'un aslında kötü "biri" olduğunu sezmiştim nitekim ilerledikçe de haklı çıkmamın verdiği endişe ve oyunun atmosferi beni yer yer hafiften ürküttü. 
Ayrıca oyun bana "Cube" filmini anımsattı bir yerlerde hapsedilmişsiniz ve aklınızı kullanarak kurtulmaya çalışıyorsunuz ama bu iş göründüğü kadar basit değil.

Son kısım beni biraz şaşırttı eski oyunlardaki gibi klişe olarak boss çıkıyor ve onu yok etmek için biraz uğraşmanız gerekiyor gibi bir şey, ben daha farklı bir son bekliyordum ama bu durum oyunun muhteşemliğine gölge düşürmüyor.
Türkçe altyazı ile senaryoyu daha anlaşılır bir şekilde yaşama imkanı güzel.
Bu arada internetten walkthrough yardımı almadan, tamamıyla kendi başınıza bitirmenizi tavsiye ederim. Bu şekilde alacağınız keyif en üst seviyede olur.

Her şeyi geçtim sondaki o şarkı için bile tekrar bitirilebilir.
Oyun hikaye modu dışında ekstra haritalara ve topluluk yapımı modlara da sahip.

Portal ist meiner Meinung nach, auch ohne besondere Story, ein sehr gutes Spiel.
tellement court...

Portal ist ein atmosphärisches Physik-Rätselspiel, dass man in 5 Stunden durchspielen kann.
Es ist relativ schlicht gehalten, und die Grafik ist dem Erscheinungsdatum entsprechend, was aber nicht stört, da hauptsächlich einfarbige Flächen vorhanden sind.

Das Spiel erzählt die Geschichte einer Testperson die Miithilfe der "Portal-gun" (einer Waffe die ein oranges und ein blaues Portal erzeugen kann, durch welches man dann Reisen kann. So kann mn z.B. ein Portal auf der anderen Seite eines abgrundes erzeugen und eines hinter sich, durch das man dan geht und sich auf der anderen Seite befindet.)
zahlreiche Testkammern durchquert, bis man vom Weg abweicht, was GLADOS, der KI die die Parcours organisiert nicht passt, woraufhin sie versucht euch zu töten.

Einen besonders großen Anteil an der guten Atmosphäre hatt die Stimme von GLADOS die alles Kommentiert.
Und glaubt mir, die Sprüche sind wirklich lustig.

Ich finde jeder sollte dieses Spiel einmal gespielt haben, vor allem weil es regelmäßig in den Sales ist, wo es nur 3 € kostet (die wirklich gut angelegt sind).

Portal's problem is it's length, so pick the game up when an offer comes around.

If you do it's a wonderful puzzle game, fresh, new and rewarding. The game only took me 2.5 hours to beat and while there're advanced maps to play after, it's really only modified version of maps you've already played.
The games build by Valve using the Source engine so it runs without a hitch and you'll find all the options you could want in the menus.
The goal of the game is to maniplulate portals using a 'portal gun' to solve puzzles and find your way to the exit. The base games are not overly challenging and I didn't find myself getting stuck for longer than a few minutes before I'd figured it out, but you get a nice sense of reward when finishing a stage non the less.

I would recommend this at a sales price simply because it's such a short game.
It is very challenging and very fun. would recomend to anyone who likes challenges and puzzles

This is an amazing game. It is short with the main part of the game takng me 3 hours. But when you're done you can do the advanced maps which are harder versions of the puzzles in the main game. There are also challenge maps where you do a puzzle in the least amout of steps,portals or time. This is a game which should definitely be in your library.

very good game. Puzzles progress nicely, they don't get too difficult straight away.

Многие люди под словом шутер понимает игры в жанре counter strike - ходи и убивай. Portal перезагружает это понятие: теперь у вас нет соперников. Единственная цель - дойти до конца. Если counter strike и могут считать игрой для безмозглых, то о Portal такого сказать нельзя.
Из-за того, что это был дебют такого жанра шутеров, то большая половина игры представляет собой обучалку, основной сюжет начинается тогда, когда вы получаете тортик. Это единственный миус этой игры - затянутость обучения.

Exelente game também,a história por traz do jogo o deixa ainda mais incrivel, isso acompanhado com o seu sucessor o Porta 2!!

Portal is a first person puzzle game unlike anything that I have ever seen. One of my favorite puzzle games of all time. Anyone interested in puzzle games needs to give this a try.
Solve elaborated puzzles, in the most unique fashion way to do it. Through portals.
Got the cake at the end so I was not disappointed.  10/10

Portal introduit un nouveau gameplay à base de portail de transfert. Après un début de jeu assez simple qui explique les bases du jeu (création des 2 portails, gestion de la gravité etc.), les énigmes se compliquent un peu mais rien d'insurmontable, en réfléchissant bien on trouve la solution. 

Contrairement à ce que l'on peut penser, il ne s'agit pas uniquement d'un jeu à énigmes. Portal dispose d'un vrai un univers, au fur et à mesure que l'on avance dans le jeu, on en apprend plus sur l'histoire.

Le jeu est court (entre 3H-5H suivant vos capacités à résoudre les énigmes) mais se révèle très surprenant dans son déroulement (je n'en dis pas plus pour ne pas gacher la découverte de ce jeu).

Non credo questo gioco abbia bisogno di recensioni, è talmente conosciuto e apprezzato globalmente che ripetere quanto sia meraviglioso sarebbe inutile.

Ciò nonostante... 10/10

Nunca tinha visto um jogo com uma proposta tão original quanto esta. Portal é um jogo que foge de todos os padrões estabelecidos que vemos na maioria dos jogos. Não é um dos melhores jogos que joguei (principalmente pela sua pouca duração), mas com certeza é uma das melhores propostas que um jogo me proporcionou.

Like a slice of cake, Portal is a game that is short, sweet, and will leave you wanting more and more. The size of the game is the only valid complaint that I can imagine anybody having. But that's it, one of the (if not [b] THE [/b]) greatest puzzle game of all time, and it's just always being crammed into good deals.

wow.... it's been a while... i was 11 when me and my best friend adrian set out to our local gamestop to but the orange box, a compilation of 5 valve games for our pc's. i had really only been getting this for portal and tf2, but hey, i had money, so why not.  that was in 2008. we played the hell out of this game, just being amazed by the whole concept. each day we would talk about what level we  were at at school. we met another group of kids (2) who played the game as well. we became friends,talking about different ways to master gameplay. we walked home, taking a cut to the comic store to buy portal trading cards and posters. ah, those were the days. buy this game, it's old, but has aged well :)

One of my all time favorite games. If you have not experienced the unique, comical and inginuitive world that is Portal, buy this game now. If you are trying to decide between this and Portal 2, I would recommend starting here. This game has a very short playtime, so if you are not sure, buy this on a steam sale. But seriously, this game is awesome. I am always suprised to find people who still haven't been enlightened, but that's what this review is for. Buy it! You won't regret it!

What? 
After all these years and you've never played Portal? 
Then why are you reading reviews of Portal when you could be playing Portal? What's the deal? 
You're wasting so much precious Portal playing time. 

What are you on the fence about? 
Worried it might be too original? 
Too fun? 
Too thougtfully challenging? 
Too immersive in presentation and atmosopher? 
Too well written and darkly comedic? 
Thought the "The cake is a lie" thing was too overplayed? Ok you got me on that one.
Too good? Is that it? Do you just not like games that are too good? 

That has to be it, because literally no matter what kind of games you like, you'll like Portal. 
Indie games
Puzzle games
First person shooters
Casual games.
Art games. 
Literally anything. 
Do you like interactive software that is broadly classified as "games?"
You'll like Portal. 

Why aren't you playing Portal?

Go play Portal.

This game is great. Fun puzzles and great humor.

Portal is a pretty short game and with a bit of trial and error involved in every level, I guess an entire playthrough is about 5 hours. You can do some challenge levels for some more gamepley, but that's pretty much it. That's ok though, as Portal is a brilliant game in almost ervery respect. I won't get into all the great features of the game, I can only tell you it's worth you time and money. Most importantly: the levels are great, slowly increasing in difficulty, but never too hard. Besides that the game has a nice, darkly humorous undertone, which is entirely based on the relationship between you and the game's antagonist (which, by the way, are the ONLY characters in the game).

In the end, this game may not give you much playtime but after you played it, you think a lot more about THIS game than about many other, longer games. When it's not on sale, I admit it would not really be cheap given the duration of the game, but when it's on sale it's definetely a no-brainer.

Oh yeah, and do not forget not to assume the party escort submission position. Nobody will come.

Portal est un concept à lui tout seul et la progression de plus en plus difficile vous donnera du fil à retordre.

Mesmo depois de quase 8 anos, Portal ainda me surpreende. O fato do personagem não falar como na franquia Half-Life só ajuda na construção da atmosfera deste jogo. A única coisa que segura Portal para trás são os Challenge Maps, que muitos discordarão, mas são muito difíceis para jogadores casuais. Uma dica para quem comprar: jogue este jogo até acabar a história, mesmo porquê você vai ficar tão vidrado que não vai conseguir jogar outra coisa até acabar.
